channel.title: Flexstreams on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Flexstreams on Rotational Labs

item.title: Mastering the Art of Data Freshness
item.description: Two decades ago Clive Humby proclaimed “data is the new oil”, marking an economic shift towards data products. But, if the intervening years have taught us anything, it’s to think of data more like fresh fruit.
